Tasks.Task Description: Continuously monitor the health and performance of AKS clusters using Azure Monitor and Kubernetes-native tools. Identify and address any anomalies or resource bottlenecks.
Ensure proper configuration of node scaling and autoscaling settings to handle workload changes efficiently. Regularly review and adjust settings based on usage patterns.
Perform regular upgrades of AKS clusters to the latest supported Kubernetes version. Validate compatibility with workloads and ensure minimal downtime during upgrades.
Apply security patches to AKS nodes and underlying infrastructure. Ensure compliance with organizational security policies and industry standards.
Implement and test backup solutions for AKS workloads and configurations. Validate disaster recovery plans to ensure resiliency in case of failures.
Analyze resource usage and optimize AKS cluster configurations to reduce costs and improve performance. Implement recommendations from Azure Advisor.
Conduct regular audits of AKS configurations and workloads to ensure compliance with organizational policies and regulatory requirements.
Develop and execute incident response plans for AKS cluster issues. Use Azure tools and Kubernetes logs to troubleshoot and resolve problems.
Maintain up-to-date documentation of AKS cluster configurations, operational procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
Regularly review and manage node pools to ensure optimal performance and resource allocation. Add or remove node pools as needed.
Ensure container images used in AKS workloads are regularly updated to include the latest security patches and features.
Review and optimize AKS cluster networking configurations, including virtual networks, subnets, and network policies.
Conduct performance tests and benchmarking for AKS workloads to identify bottlenecks and optimize resource allocation.
Regularly review and update Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings to ensure secure access to AKS clusters.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding AKS cluster performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
